blogPost.excerpt: With Match you can copy colors of any image with one click. Use machine learning to create your own color grading presets and instantly change the color of your images with one powerful, simple-to-use app that runs directly in your browser.
blogPost.body: With Match you can copy colors of any image with one click. Use machine learning to create your own color grading presets and instantly change the color of your images with one powerful, simple-to-use app that runs directly in your browser.
blogPost.title: Match by Color.io - Automatically match colors of any image or movie with ML
blogPost.author: Jonathan Ochmann

localize.description: 通过Match，你可以一键复制任何图像的颜色。使用机器学习创建您自己的颜色分级预设，并通过一个强大的、简单易用的应用程序直接在浏览器中运行，立即改变图像的颜色。
localize.tagline: 使用ML自动匹配任何图像或电影的颜色。

localize.description: 通過Match，你可以一鍵複製任何圖像的顏色。使用機器學習創建您自己的顏色分級預設，並通過一個強大的、簡單易用的應用程序直接在瀏覽器中運行，立即改變圖像的顏色。
localize.tagline: 使用ML自動匹配任何圖像或電影的顏色。

previous.excerpt: Faster and more intuitive, the Float mobile app has an all new interface that makes it easy to view and schedule tasks, log hours, and set a status - in just a few taps! “A sleek and intuitive UI, that’s lightning fast.” John K., Software Engineer, Anthroware
previous.title: Float Mobile App 2.0 - The fastest access to your schedule & timesheets on the go

localize.description: 更快、更直观，Float移动应用拥有一个全新的界面，可以轻松查看和安排任务、记录小时数和设置状态--只需点击几下即可! "时尚直观的用户界面，速度快如闪电。" John K.，软件工程师，Anthroware。
localize.tagline: 最快地访问您的日程表和时间表，在旅途中

localize.description: 更快、更直觀，Float移動應用擁有一個全新的界面，可以輕鬆查看和安排任務、記錄小時數和設置狀態--只需點擊幾下即可! "時尚直觀的用戶界面，速度快如閃電。" John K.，軟件工程師，Anthroware。
localize.tagline: 最快地訪問您的日程表和時間表，在旅途中

next.excerpt: Join the internet in making the Ever Given stuck in other areas outside of just the Suez Canal. You can even make the boat to scale.
next.title: Ever Given Ever Ywhere - Get the Ever Given stuck wherever you want 🚢

localize.description: 加入互联网，让Ever Given号卡在苏伊士运河以外的其他地区。你甚至可以按比例制作这艘船。
localize.tagline: 让Ever Given卡在你想要的地方🚢。

localize.description: 加入互聯網，讓Ever Given號卡在蘇伊士運河以外的其他地區。你甚至可以按比例製作這艘船。
localize.tagline: 讓Ever Given卡在你想要的地方🚢。
